org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.chromium

Class JavascriptVmFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.chromium.JavascriptVmFactory

  • public abstract class JavascriptVmFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory for JavascriptVm instances. Note that WipBrowser instances are created in a specialized class WipBrowserFactory.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static JavascriptVmFactory getInstance()
        Gets a JavascriptVmFactory instance. This method should be overridden by implementations that want to construct other implementations of Browser.
        Returns:
        a JavascriptVmFactory singleton instance

      • createStandalone

        public abstract StandaloneVm createStandalone(java.net.SocketAddress socketAddress,
                                              ConnectionLogger connectionLogger)
        Constructs StandaloneVm instance that talks to a V8 JavaScript VM via DebuggerAgent opened at socketAddress.
        Parameters:
        socketAddress - V8 DebuggerAgent is listening on
        connectionLogger - provides facility for listening to network traffic; may be null

      • getRootLogger

        public static java.util.logging.Logger getRootLogger()
        Returns:
        SDK root logger that can be used to add handlers or to adjust log level
